text: The Federal Commissioner for Data Protection and Freedom of Information (German: Bundesbeauftragter f√ºr den Datenschutz und die Informationsfreiheit, BfDI) is an agency in the government of Germany.http://www.dw.com/en/commissioner-slams-data-retention- policies/a-18523077 It is currently held by Ulrich Kelber since January 7 2019.https://www.bundestag.de/abgeordnete/biografien/K/kelber_ulrich-520922 ==References== Category:Government of Germany Category:Data protection
title: Federal Commissioner for Data Protection and Freedom of Information
